images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful Japanese model, embodying a top-tier gravure idol aesthetic, in a relaxed weekend vibe. She’s posing in front of a gym mirror, wearing a Korean preppy-style outfit: a cropped, fitted cable-knit cardigan in cream over a delicate white lace bralette, a high-waisted pleated denim mini skirt hugging her curves, and thigh-high white socks. Her straight, black silky hair cascades down her shoulders. Softbox beauty lighting (柔光箱人像打光) illuminates flawless, realistic skin – visible pores and faint vellus hair are key – as she gives a playful wink. A casually draped pastel pink blanket and fluffy pillows are visible slightly out of focus behind her, hinting at a cozy break. Shot on Sony A7R IV, 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, showcasing exquisite depth of field, ray tracing and global illumination, with high contrast and sharp color grading. Background blurred with beautiful bokeh.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
